name: The Emperor's Gift
summary: A young boy is recruited into the Grey Knights, and must hone his fledgling psychic talents if he is to join the hallowed and mysterious ranks of the Space Marine daemon hunters.
info:
• 中文名: 帝皇的馈赠
  • 出版社: Games Workshop
  • 价格: $24.99
  • 发售日: 2012-05-29
  • 页数: 320
  • ISBN: 1849701903
  • 作者: Aaron Dembski-Bowden
